title: Prospect customer approach
text: Customer contact with Moneymithra, through various sources, toll-free number, enquiry on website, connect through social media, through a reference etc.

title: Counselling by Sales Manager
text: Upon establishing connect, a SM is assigned to the customer to understand his requirements to assess the customerâ€™s requirement of the financial product.

title: Offering of best suited offers and product
text: SMs provide you with solution to your financial issue considering the offers from various banks, helps you with the comparison to get you the best deal, in terms of the maximum benefit and least cost.

title: Application and documents submission
text: SMs will guide you and prepares the Application for you, Collects necessary documents, verifies application and documents for completeness and submits the same to the bank.

title: Bank Process assistance
text: SMs track your application and are constantly in touch with financial institution to ensure the process is expedited without any glitches until the application is processed and approved.

title: Amount disbursal to account
text: After the Approval process, our SM facilitates the last leg of the process until completions, processes the agreements, & ensures your desired product is delivered to you (loan amount disbursal/credit card/insurance etc)
